document.full_text: the afghan army is reviewing recruitment after several high profile attacks by assailants in afghan security force uniforms, including one inside the defense ministry this week, a ministry spokesman said on wednesday.
document.title: afghan army reviewing recruitment after attack
lines_and_colors: the afghan army is reviewing recruitment after several high profile attacks by assailants in afghan security force uniforms, including one inside the defense ministry this week, a ministry spokesman said on wednesday.
